duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform golf club repairs, including re-gripping, re-shafting, loft and lie adjustments.
Manage workflow for all customer services, including establishing turn-around times to meet customer’s needs.
Promote Company programs, such as Warranty Sales, Scorecard, Private Label Credit Card, etc.
Manage golf service supply inventory by accurately tracking shop usage.
Provides a high level of customer service by consistently putting the customer at the center of everything we do.
Uphold Company standards for merchandise presentation by ensuring that product is on the sales floor to proper inventory levels and is maintained to daily standards.
Maintain confidentiality of all Company information.
Create an inclusive in-store environment where everyone feels welcome, safe, and is treated with respect.
Support the team across the store.
Perform other tasks as assigned by management.

education_certification.credential: 1-2 years of club fitting, loft/lie adjustment, and/or re-gripping experience preferred.
Ability to stand, bend, stoop, reach, push, pull and lift up to 35 lbs.
Ability to work extended periods of time (up to 4 hours) standing or walking.
Ability to perform repetitive motions for short periods of time (up to 2 hours continuously)
